rules.text: Do not join or engage with this server and its members unless you are 18 or older.
Do not share content that engages with underage/loli/shota/minor content.
Do not post rude or aggressive content.
Hate speech is not to be tolerated.
Personal attacks, trolling, and abuse will not be tolerated.
Include relevant content or trigger warnings when posting content.
Attribute content creators, especially when you yourself are not said creator.
Treat others on the server as you would treat them in real life.
Respect and protect the privacy of your fellow community members.
Be polite and communicate with respect, especially in regards to sexual preferences. In other words, “Do not yuck someone’s yum”.
Contact the Monster Mistress directly with any feedback.
